alert.note: Alert for Talbot; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 28 at 10:42AM EDT until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia... Flint River at US 19 near Carsonville affecting Upson, Talbot, Taylor and Crawford Counties. Flint River near Griffin affecting Spalding and Fayette Counties. Flint River near Thomaston affecting Upson and Talbot Counties. Flint River at GA 26 near Montezuma affecting Macon, Sumter and Dooly Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Flint River near Thomaston. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 11.1 feet and falling slowly. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 AM EDT Tuesday was 12.3 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 11 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
